item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Is the world really running out of sand? (73 points | 29 comments)
2. Comparing our Rust-based indexing and querying pipeline to Langchain (56 points | 25 comments)
3. Show HN: A real time AI video agent with under 1 second of latency (59 points | 23 comments)
4. PS5 Dashboards Flooded with Unwanted Ads–Sony Claims It Wasn't Intentional (34 points | 16 comments)
5. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (183 points | 45 comments)
6. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) Is Hiring Back End and Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
7. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (October 2024) (74 points | 77 comments)
8. The Netherlands has returned some stolen artifacts to Indonesia (112 points | 84 comments)
9. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (424 points | 102 comments)
10. Comedy Theory (2022) (193 points | 129 comments)
11. Mozilla's lapse in judgement causes clash with uBlock Origin developer (210 points | 131 comments)
12. Hasbro's Trademark for the Smell of Play-Doh (2018) (28 points | 25 comments)
13. Bop Spotter (2247 points | 365 comments)
14. Better privacy can be one click away. Google and Apple won't allow it (30 points | 9 comments)

16. The Liberating Experience of Common Lisp (83 points | 63 comments)

21. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (198 points | 51 comments)
22. Evolving GitHub Issues (90 points | 59 comments)
23. Sea robins use leg-like fins to taste, navigate seafloor, researchers discover (38 points | 5 comments)
24. What the photographer who’s taken philosopher portraits thinks of philosophers (41 points | 15 comments)
25. Amtrak's New Marketing Strategy: It's Not a Train, It's a Hotel on Wheels (5 points | discuss)
26. Earth has caught a 'second moon' (7 points | 3 comments)
27. PyTorch Native Architecture Optimization: Torchao (156 points | 46 comments)
28. Show HN: Facad – A colorful directory listing tool for the command line (136 points | 85 comments)
29. Vanishing Culture: Preserving Cookbooks (139 points | 94 comments)
30. Do All Problems Have Technical Fixes? (69 points | 70 comments)
